March 28, 1910 D Southern Counties Association Contest (2nd Section)
Southern Counties Association Contest (2nd Section) 10 Test Piece Contest Southern Counties Association Contest southern-counties-association-contest-2nd-section
None
Siege of Rochelle [arr. Round]
Priory Park, Chichester Prizes - 1st £5 and shield, 2nd £3. 10s., 3rd £2.5s., 4th £1.15s. Best trombone - Sutton. Best euphonium - Copthorne. 6 bands competed.
March 11, 2018, 5:19 p.m. March 12, 2018, 10:55 a.m.
1 Sutton Red Cross W. Gill
2 Copthorne Silver Band George Banks
3 The Egham Band H. Sutcliffe
4 Fleet J. A. Ritchie
5 Crowborough Silver Thomas Briggs
6 Redhill Men's Own Walter Bashford
